headline: Truist starts Reddit at ‘buy’ on strong growth in ads and engagement
summary: Investing.com -- Truist Securities initiated coverage of Reddit Inc (NYSE:RDDT) with a Buy rating and a price target of $150 citing the company’s rapid growth trajectory, margin expansion potential, and differentiated position in the digital advertising space.
